description:
Bet you've already recognized what this is, right? Yes, a version of good old Bubble Shooter. Just remind you the classic rules: get as many points as you can by shooting away sets of three and more bubble birds of the same color. Also, the birds that are not linked to the main group will explode too, giving you ten times more points than the original burst. So, be smart and build your chains intelligently.

Have fun and enjoy this combination of the classic game and our unique features!

Features:
- Beautiful and extraordinary birds theme graphics
- Specifically designed for touch-screen phones
- Hours of entertainment on your mobile phone
